Posts.Content: partridge wrote: I just got the results from my CT of chest with contrast.  Conclusion is: 1. Small 7mm pleural based nodule abutting left lateral pleura. 2. patchy/nodular opacity in right middle lobe approx 8 mm x 5 mm. 3.  These nodular densities are nonspecific in etiology possibly relating to noncalcified granuloma.  Neoplasm is not excluded and clinicial correlation and continued followup imaging at 3- and 6- month intervals is recommended. I had IDC, tubular cancer, stage 1, 0/5 nodes.  No chemo; had radiation therapy and tamoxifen and arimidex x 5 yrs.  I will see pulmonologist in 5 weeks and I'm pretty sure he will suggest I wait 3 mo and redo cat scan.  I think I can handle the wait but DH is panicked.  Should I be? Dx 1/2003, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lung CT results partridge LongHornSurvivor

Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2008 03:08AM partridge wrote: Laurie: I had a ferocious bladder infection about a month ago with continuing blood in my urine since then.  My internal med dr. ordered an abdominal ct scan to rule out tumors, stones, etc. in my kidneys.  This scan caught the lower part of my lungs and showed the 7mm nodule.  The second ct was of my chest and was dye enhanced (the abdominal scan wasn't).  I learned that I'm allergic to the iodine dye - lovely rash all over my body that itched like blazes. The abdominal scan was negative for bladder problems, fortunately.  Not so the chest scan..... Please post here when you learn what is recommended for your followup - I hope whatever they find is not bad.
Posts.Title: Lung CT results partridge LongHornSurvivor

Posts.Content: partridge wrote: It's the little things that get to me.  Such as how can I get the gooey adhesive residue off my chest from the ekg pads and my arms from the IV?  I've tried soap & washcloth, DH's aftershave, and nail polish remover. I can't stand the smell of Goo Gone.  Will plain old rubbing alcohol work?  I don't have it in the house, so haven't tried it.  Any suggestions? Dx 1/2003, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
